excerpt: PD42-x-1670 is an easy to use and rather compact PANdrive™ smart BLDC motor.The module is controlled via CAN bus interface and comes with two ﬁrmware options–TMCL and CANopen. The PD42-x-1670 line oﬀer an integrated hall sensor based encoder for closed-loop FOC-based operation.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial Featuresclosed loop controlFOC
